4.text: [ish_svg_icon icon="path_plugin/beautiful-flat-icons/newpaper.svg" type="hexagon_rounded" bg_glow="yes" color="color5" align="center" size="150" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3"][ish_headline tag_size="h1" align="center" color="color5" icon_align="left" tag="div" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3"]EXPANDABLE AREA[/ish_headline][ish_headline tag_size="h4" color="color3" icon_align="left" tag="div" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3" align="center"]Use all default WordPress shortcodes or bring the area to life with custom shortcodes.[/ish_headline][ish_separator color="color3" type="thin" align="center" width_percent="85" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3"]

5.text: [ish_separator color="color3" type="thin" align="center" width_percent="85" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3"][ish_headline tag_size="h4" color="color3" icon_align="left" tag="div" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3" align="center"]... and much, much, more ...[/ish_headline][ish_button el_text="BUY BOLDIAL NOW" size="small" align="center" color="color5" text_color="color4" icon="ish-icon-basket-1" icon_align="left" tooltip_color="color1" tooltip_text_color="color3" url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.ishyoboy.com%2Fboldial%2Fbuy-now||target:%20_blank"]

2.text: Boldial is a Premium Creative WordPress Theme brought by IshYoBoy.com. It is built upon a powerful and extremely customizable framework. Boldial contains a drag and drop page builder. It is Translation Ready and 100% compatible with WPML plugin. Boldial plays perfectly with the best e-commerce system on the market - WooCommerce. [ish_button el_text="Buy Now" url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.ishyoboy.com%2Fboldial%2Fbuy-now%2F|title:Buy%20Now|target:%20_blank" size="small" color="color5" text_color="color4" icon_align="left" tooltip_color="color1" align="left"]

3.title: Bluehost compatible
3.text: Bluehost has been a WordPress partner since 2005 and powers over one million WordPress sites. Their goal is to provide outstanding hosting services and customer support for the best possible price.
